dict.acceptation: 宣布；声明，声称；申报；[法]供述；

sent.orig: Follow the green signs unless you have goods to declare/if you haven't any goods to declare.
sent.trans: 未携须申报货物者，沿绿色标记通行。

sent.orig: To make or declare void or invalid, as a marriage or a law; nullify.
sent.trans: 制定，宣布免除或无效，如婚约或法律；废除。

sent.orig: If any objection, I'll declare the meeting closed.
sent.trans: 如果没人反对，我就宣布会议结束。

sent.orig: I declare thatabove is complete and true.
sent.trans: 我声明本申请表所填写的内容是真实的、有效的、完整的。

sent.orig: Domestic Flight | Do you have anything to declare?
sent.trans: 国内班机您有任何东西要申报吗？
